wikipedia_page.main: Frank Burnett Searle (20 January 1906 – 16 June 1977) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Bristol City, Charlton Athletic, Chester, Clapton Orient, Watford and Stoke.

response: * Frank Searle (photographer) (1921–2005), British photographer of the Loch Ness Monster
* Frank Searle (businessman) (1874–1948), Chief Engineer of the London General Omnibus Company and managing director of Imperial Airways
